definitions.definition: A sedative of the benzodiazepine class, used (as the hydrochloride ) chiefly as a premedication for anesthesia ; 8- chloro- 6-(2- fluorophenyl )-1- methyl -4 H - imidazo [1,5- a ][1,4]benzodiazepine, C 18 H 13 ClFN 3 .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A sedative of the benzodiazepine class, used (as the hydrochloride ) chiefly as a premedication for anesthesia ; 8- chloro- 6-(2- fluorophenyl )-1- methyl -4 H - imidazo [1,5- a ][1,4]benzodiazepine, C 18 H 13 ClFN 3 .
